title: Panadura ambulance shooting: Main suspect detained to be interrogated
content: The court has granted permission to detain the main suspect in the attempted murder of an ambulance driver at the Kethumathi Hospital in Panadura for seven days and to be interrogated. He was produced before the Panadura Magistrate's Court yesterday. A team of officers from the Panadura South Police Station arrested the suspect last night with 8 grams of heroin. The suspect is a 32-year-old resident of Kuruppumulla, Panadura.
